attributes.action: Prevent the closure of Royal Air Force Station Lyneham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Royal Air Force Lyneham is set to close by 2012. With both C-130 Herculese Squadrons being moved to RAF Brize Norton - which is already at capacity.

Over the years Royal Air Force Lyneham had updated several building including gyms and accommodation. The Government continues to talk about "saving money" - how can they say that when, after spending millions on Lyneham, they are going to close it down??

The closure of this Station will compromise national security, as almost all of the Logistic units of the Royal Air Force are stationed in one base - RAF Brize Norton.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
